explains: adj. 白手起家的，靠个人奋斗成功的；自制的
wordGroup: self-made man 靠自己力量成功的人

sentences.en: Though active in commerce or the professions, most of the wealthy were not self-made but had inherited family fortunes.
sentences.cn: 尽管在商业领域或职场活跃着，大多数富人不是白手起家，而是继承了家族财富。

sentences.en: He was proud of the fact that he was a self-made man.
sentences.cn: 他为自己白手起家而自豪。
